ing: 1 2/3 tablespoons salt-free garlic and herb seasoning (such as Mrs. DashÂ®)
des: "I created this when I couldn't find a dressing that was free of vinegar and dairy. We use it in place of mayonnaise and sour cream too."
ins: Place tofu, olive oil, garlic and herb seasoning, almond milk, lemon juice, garlic, and sea salt in a blender or food processor; blend until smooth. Let stand for 2 to 3 hours before serving.
